The present state of New-England considered in a discourse on the necessities and advantages of a public spirit in every man ... : made at the lecture in Boston, 20 d. 1 m. 1690, upon the news of an invasion by bloody Indians and French-men begun upon us / by Cotton Mather. Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
[2], 52 p.
Printed by Samuel Green, Boston : 1690.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
=======

Mather, Cotton, 1663-1728.
[2], 52 p.
Printed by Samuel Green, Boston : 1690.
